subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Devan Dubnyk made 17 saves, Jason Pominville and Zach Parise scored second-period goals, and Minnesota earned a 3-0 victory over St. Louis in Game 3 of their Western Conference series.
snippet: Devan Dubnyk made 17 saves, Jason Pominville and Zach Parise scored second-period goals, and Minnesota earned a 3-0 victory over St. Louis in Game 3 of their Western Conference series.
